body:
WTF isn't that guy penis get more small than previous chapter 
how much author want to insult him!!
ntr is about the over nerfred protagonist and superpower antagonist :v haha FAK
this is great stuff
lmao the artist made the bf's dick smaller. Why not just start a new story with new characters? Why change a character's dick size for the sake of NTR?
Bruh!! Even naruto has better plot armour than this
calling others vanilla faggots but to ignore the fact that ntr or vanilla stupid plot is still stupid plot lol, nagare even turn her bf's dick smaller just for ntr plot admit it dude.
I realised it by just scrolling but it's name is kaname date which is the same one as the game called ai:the somnium files' main character lol
Vanilla faggots always set the bars too high, their dicks go limp if they slightly feel uncomfortable. Go get a fucking life instead of crying about plot in a hentai
Does Nag have a Twitter and can he add English on his https://nhentai.net/g/197260/
interesting
Wonder why the best artists tend towards the shittiest plots that ruin their works.

@male tears
Yeah, but he wasn't penetrating her womb and smashing it up into her stomach like she apparently likes now. Gotta love that hentai logic -_-

This thing just get more and more stupid every chapter XD
Decent art but trash plot.
huft,same shit as usual,the absolutely typical of ntr story
Well at least she still tries to feel good with bf... But ya know, a slut for once a slut for life.
Just end this one. In the bin. Burn it. Just let the cucked discover shes been cheating and  her watch her suffer. She belong to the streets.
It says August 28, where the fck is the raw version of next chapter???

Author cashed in on the NTR lovers and shrunk his dick for plot. I can forgive a lot, and even throwing away a good story for bullshit is okay but no art consistency? That’s just fucking stupid. The plot went downhill really fucking fast. Even by NTR standards this isn’t a good one. 2/10 author needs to learn to do plots again

Kinda wish for once the ntr story would get a good ending, like maybe the cuck gets angry after finding out and takes some experimental drug and ntrs the guy back or something... all these ntr hentais are starting to make me paranoid about dating
they were having womb-stabby sex in chapters 1-3, so the idea that "his dick doesn't reach" is just weird. idk i'm surprised nagare is still doing this
I still hope the cuck to be fucked by the mother

LMFAO

What kind of scientific discovery is this!? It’s like somebody messed with a skyrim penis body-slider last second LOL
Any real explanation of why his dick shrunk? Because that's the lamest plot armor of all, even worse than DBZ's plot armor.
Yo they actually shrunk is dick so much compared to the beginning wtf lol

@Admiral Bathory Well, Nagare's NTR stories tend to be especially stupid. Of course, this one is worse because it's stupid and boring. Shiori finding out and doing something is probably the only way anything progresses and we mercifully get closer to the end.

This story when it first started was nice, amazing even, but then it devolved to this. It’s cool for people to have their kinks and all but, honestly this just hurts to read. To Even look at. For a tale I had good hopes for to end up like this just really hurts where it matters
Ohh yes completed version
At this point i just want to know the ending. Will their relationship got discovered. Will the girl truly eloped with that guy. Etc etc.

I like the scenes but i lost all respect for her and his bestfriend, ppl do this in real life cheat but wont leave cause they do care but since they had better sex with another they use the other person as a outlet to satisfy that sexual urge. Its sad alot of ppl cheat more than you think now more than ever hard to find good ppl cause morals getting twisted

NTR's always gotta make the cuck's dick below average... :/ Even if the guy stealing her is above average, at least they could let the main guy's dick be average size. Then again, just shows how little she cares for the guy she claims to love the most...this is why she's so desperate to prove it to herself that she still loves him...deep down she knows she doesn't care for him that much anymore. BF needs to just hurry up and discover them and leave them both behind.
Just as I thought from classic NTR story, the girl prefer big sick and then leave her BF immediatelly
I like this story

Nice
